0b568e38bed8b0640d8d551c7fc4290d1a74b241.query: SELECT twitter_account_id, consumer_key, consumer_secret FROM twitter_login WHERE last_updated IS NULL OR last_updated < now() - interval '6 hours' LIMIT 100

1fd94f1d96f700960dc4b224d9c185a447fca250.query: SELECT id FROM twitter_account WHERE id = ANY($1) AND last_updated > now() - interval '7 day'

239d3e4570fb03afd0e07a3c47d701bdc889aeb2.query: SELECT twitter_event.created_at, twitter_event.event_name, twitter_account.id, twitter_account.screen_name, twitter_account.display_name FROM twitter_event JOIN twitter_account ON twitter_account.id = twitter_event.related_twitter_account_id WHERE login_twitter_account_id = $1 ORDER BY created_at

3f156606e0ac2eb546d56f1f164e80778649dff3.query: SELECT max(created_at) FROM twitter_state WHERE login_twitter_account_id = $1

53195ea3e9d5641c8e5222e45b59840cd5e655ad.query: SELECT id, screen_name, display_name FROM twitter_account WHERE id = $1

58823805c75b759216628af0dbf142a1b9b830a8.query: UPDATE twitter_login SET last_updated = current_timestamp WHERE twitter_account_id = $1

6da227467190b48509286792c7f07f5feb62b550.query: SELECT follower_ids FROM twitter_state WHERE login_twitter_account_id = $1 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1

8392f1b4a9ae39df42c4184d84b27313c612234c.query: INSERT INTO twitter_account (id, screen_name, display_name) VALUES ($1, $2, $3) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET last_updated = current_timestamp, screen_name = EXCLUDED.screen_name, display_name = EXCLUDED.display_name

b548046b584ba70a7841724e5f9ebd7d5e78bd6c.query: SELECT created_at, follower_count FROM twitter_state WHERE login_twitter_account_id = $1 ORDER BY created_at LIMIT 100

b735305b65473e0097d8d0e3cf92a43238bb4ef0.query: INSERT INTO twitter_login (twitter_account_id, consumer_key, consumer_secret) VALUES ($1, $2, $3) ON CONFLICT (twitter_account_id) DO UPDATE SET consumer_key = EXCLUDED.consumer_key, consumer_secret = EXCLUDED.consumer_secret

bfef58fbf06d26d8155a74f82908bf68cb8878c3.query: INSERT INTO twitter_event (login_twitter_account_id, related_twitter_account_id, event_name) VALUES ($1, $2, 'unfollow')

d7b961061c5261e238e0998219cbdf737efba47d.query: SELECT twitter_event.created_at, twitter_event.event_name, twitter_account.id, twitter_account.screen_name, twitter_account.display_name FROM twitter_event JOIN twitter_account ON twitter_account.id = twitter_event.related_twitter_account_id WHERE login_twitter_account_id = $1 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5000

e557987e5411d2e2d55132697423fc146c7edb25.query: INSERT INTO twitter_event (login_twitter_account_id, related_twitter_account_id, event_name) VALUES ($1, $2, 'follow')
